EmailTemplate.name: Superdrug Phlebotomy Clinic Visit
EmailTemplate.subject: Book your Optimale Blood Test Clinic Visit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Book your Venous Blood Test Clinic Visit with our partner Superdrug ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
Dear {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
Thank you for ordering a Clinic Visit to take your Venous Blood Test.
Please click the button below to book your appointment with our partner Superdrug.
When you attend the clinic to have your blood taken, please take your blood test kit (which you must order separately) and some personal photo identification. Let them know that you have booked with Optimale, and quote your order number, which is {{{Phlebotomy__c.Name}}}
Please contact us if you cannot find a clinic in your area. If the booking link below is not working for any reason, please call this number to arrange your clinic visit: 03333 111007
Please feel welcome to contact us if you have any questions.
Book Here < https://appt.healthclinics.superdrug.com/bookings.php?compid=8345&category=99493&service=2511675 >
If you have any questions, please contact bloods@optimale.co.uk or reply to this email.
Thanks,
Optimale
Optimale Ltd, 71-75 Shelton Street, London, WC2H 9JQ, United Kingdom
